metaTags.metaDescription: Join us here for our updates and announcements for exciting updates during Security Week.

relatedBlades.title: Security Week 2024
relatedBlades.copy: During this year's Security Week, we'll make Zero Trust even more accessible and enterprise-ready, better protect brands from phishing and fraud, streamline security management, deliver dynamic machine learning protections and more.

imageAssetFile.altText: Security Week 2024 Hero Illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Security Week 2024 Hero Illustration

features.title: Welcome to Security Week 2024
features.description: Cloudflare's Chief Security Officer introduces 2024 Security Week by sharing insights into the past year of threats, security incidents and key priorities and concerns for global CISOs.

imageAssetFile.altText: Welcome to Security Week
imageAssetFile.title: Welcome to Security Week

features.title: Changing the industry with CISA's Secure by Design principles
features.description: Security considerations should be an integral part of software's design, not an afterthought. Explore how Cloudflare adheres to CISA's Secure by Design principles to shift the industry.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Aligns with CISA Secure-by-Design Principles, Helps Drive the Shift of Security Responsibilities from User to Software Manufacturer
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Aligns with CISA Secure-by-Design Principles, Helps Drive the Shift of Security Responsibilities from User to Software Manufacturer

features.title: Cloudflare announces Firewall for AI
features.description: Cloudflare is one of the first providers to safeguard LLM models and users in the era of AI.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Announces WAF for AI, Becomes One of the First Providers to Safeguard Models in the Era of AI
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Announces WAF for AI, Becomes One of the First Providers to Safeguard Models in the Era of AI

features.title: Cloudflare launches AI Assistant for Security Analytics
features.description: Introducing AI Assistant for Security Analytics. Now it is easier than ever to get powerful insights about your web security. Use the new integrated natural language query interface to explore Security Analytics.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Launches AI Assistant for Security Analytics
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Launches AI Assistant for Security Analytics

features.title: Dispelling the Generative AI fear: how Cloudflare secures inboxes against AI-enhanced phishing
features.description: Generative AI is being used by malicious actors to make phishing attacks much more convincing. Learn how Cloudflare's email security systems are able to see past the deception using advanced machine learning models.

imageAssetFile.altText: Dispelling the Generative AI Fear: Cloudflare Introduces New Way to Secure Inboxes from AI-Enhanced Phishing
imageAssetFile.title: Dispelling the Generative AI Fear: Cloudflare Introduces New Way to Secure Inboxes from AI-Enhanced Phishing

features.title: Introducing behavior-based user risk scoring in Cloudflare One
features.description: Cloudflare One is introducing user risk scoring, a new set of capabilities to detect risk based on user behavior, so that you can improve security posture across your organization.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One User Risk Scores
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One User Risk Scores

features.title: Navigating the maze of Magecart: a cautionary tale of a Magecart impacted website
features.description: E-commerce websites were targeted by a sophisticated Magecart attack, involving a hidden JavaScript code designed to secretly steal Personally Identifiable Information (PII) and credit card details from users. Disguised as a harmless script, it meticulously targeted specific input fields, using data encoding and local storage techniques to mask and ensure comprehensive data capture. This incident underscores the critical need for robust cybersecurity, highlighting the effectiveness of Cloudflare's multi-layered application defense, including its Web Application Firewall (WAF) and Page Shield, in protecting against such advanced threats and maintaining user trust.

imageAssetFile.altText: Navigating the Maze of Magecart
imageAssetFile.title: Navigating the Maze of Magecart

features.title: The rise of Defensive AI: Cloudflare's framework for defending against next-gen threats
features.description: From identifying phishing attempts to protect applications and APIs, Cloudflare uses AI to improve the effectiveness of its security solutions to fight against new and more sophisticated attacks.

imageAssetFile.altText: Defensive AI
imageAssetFile.title: Defensive AI

features.title: Secure your unprotected assets with Security Center: quick view for CISOs
features.description: Today we are excited to introduce a new set of capabilities within the Security Center to directly address a common challenge: ensuring comprehensive deployment across your infrastructure. Gain precise insights into where and how to optimize your security posture.

imageAssetFile.altText: A single view across your entire company security posture by Cloudflare
imageAssetFile.title: A single view across your entire company security posture by Cloudflare

features.title: Announcing two highly requested DLP enhancements: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) and Source Code Detections
features.description: Cloudflare One now supports Optical Character Recognition and detects source code as part of its Data Loss Prevention (DLP) service

imageAssetFile.altText: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) and Source Code Detections in DLP
imageAssetFile.title: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) and Source Code Detections in DLP

features.title: Simpler migration from Netskope and Zscaler to Cloudflare: introducing Deskope and a Descaler partner update
features.description: Today, Cloudflare is excited to expand the Descaler program to Authorized Service Delivery Partners (ASDPs) who will now have exclusive access to the Descaler toolkit. Cloudflare is also launching Deskope, a new set of tooling to also help migrate existing Netskope customers to Cloudflare One.

imageAssetFile.altText: Descaler update with ASDP expansion and DeSkope announcement
imageAssetFile.title: Descaler update with ASDP expansion and DeSkope announcement

features.title: Protecting APIs with JWT Validation
features.description: Cloudflare customers can now protect their APIs from broken authentication attacks by validating incoming JSON Web Tokens (JWTs) with API Gateway.

imageAssetFile.altText: API Gateway JWT Validation GA
imageAssetFile.title: API Gateway JWT Validation GA

features.title: Securing Cloudflare with Cloudflare: a Zero Trust journey
features.description: A deep dive into how we have deployed Zero Trust at Cloudflare while maintaining user privacy.

imageAssetFile.altText: Securing Cloudflare with Cloudflare: A Zero Trust Journey
imageAssetFile.title: Securing Cloudflare with Cloudflare: A Zero Trust Journey

features.title: The state of the post-quantum Internet
features.description: Today, nearly two percent of all TLS 1.3 connections established with Cloudflare are secured with post-quantum cryptography. What once was the topic of futuristic tech demos will soon be the new security baseline for the Internet. In this blog post we'll take measure of where we are now in early 2024, what to expect for the coming years, and what you can do today.

imageAssetFile.altText: The State of the Post-Quantum Internet
imageAssetFile.title: The State of the Post-Quantum Internet

features.title: Simplifying how enterprises connect to Cloudflare with Express Cloudflare Network Interconnect
features.description: Express Cloudflare Network Interconnect makes it fast and easy to connect your network to Cloudflare. Customers can now order Express CNIs directly from the Cloudflare dashboard, and they will be ready to use in 3 minutes. Express CNI also simplifies setting up Magic Transit and Magic WAN.

imageAssetFile.altText: Welcome to Security Week
imageAssetFile.title: Welcome to Security Week

features.title: Linux kernel security tunables everyone should consider adopting
features.description: This post illustrates some of the Linux Kernel features, which are helping us to keep our production systems more secure. We will deep dive into how they work and why you may consider enabling them as well.

imageAssetFile.altText: Code Red Technical deep dive for Security week
imageAssetFile.title: Code Red Technical deep dive for Security week

features.title: Eliminate VPN vulnerabilities with Cloudflare One
features.description: The Cybersecurity & Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) recently issued an Emergency Directive due to the Ivanti Connect Secure and Policy Secure vulnerabilities. In this blog, we discuss the threat actor tactics exploiting these vulnerabilities, the risk inherent in legacy VPN appliance solutions, and how Cloudflare One can mitigate these risks.

imageAssetFile.altText: Eliminate VPN Vulnerabilities Immediately
imageAssetFile.title: Eliminate VPN Vulnerabilities Immediately

features.title: Magic Cloud Networking simplifies security, connectivity, and management of public clouds
features.description: Introducing Magic Cloud Networking, a new set of capabilities to visualize and automate cloud networks to give our customers secure, easy, and seamless connection to public cloud environments.

imageAssetFile.altText: Magic Cloud Networking simplifies security, connectivity, and management of public clouds
imageAssetFile.title: Magic Cloud Networking simplifies security, connectivity, and management of public clouds

features.title: Zero Trust WARP: tunneling with a MASQUE
features.description: This blog discusses the introduction of MASQUE to Zero Trust WARP and how Cloudflare One customers will benefit from this modern protocol.

imageAssetFile.altText: Zero Trust WARP Tunnelling with a MASQUE
imageAssetFile.title: Zero Trust WARP Tunnelling with a MASQUE

features.title: Cloudflare treats SASE anxiety for VeloCloud customers
features.description: The turbulence in the SASE market is driving many customers to seek help. We're doing our part to help VeloCloud customers who are caught in the crosshairs of shifting strategies.

imageAssetFile.altText: Welcome to Security Week
imageAssetFile.title: Welcome to Security Week

features.title: Cloudflare protects global democracy against threats from emerging technology during the 2024 voting season
features.description: In 2024, more than 80 national elections are slated to occur, directly impacting approximately 4.2 billion individuals. At Cloudflare, we're ready to support a range of players in the election space by providing security, performance, and reliability tools to help facilitate the democratic process.

imageAssetFile.altText: Featured: Cloudflare Protects Global Democracy Against Threats from Emerging Technology During the 2024 Voting Season
imageAssetFile.title: Featured: Cloudflare Protects Global Democracy Against Threats from Emerging Technology During the 2024 Voting Season

features.title: Collect all your cookies in one jar with Page Shield Cookie Monitor
features.description: Protecting online privacy starts with knowing what cookies are used by your websites. Page Shield extends transparent monitoring to HTTP cookies, empowering security and compliance teams with an easy overview without the need for an external scanner, nor changing existing web applications.

imageAssetFile.altText: Page Shield Cookie monitor
imageAssetFile.title: Page Shield Cookie monitor

features.title: Free network flow monitoring for all enterprise customers
features.description: Today, we're excited to announce that a free version of Cloudflare's network flow monitoring product, Magic Network Monitoring, is now available to all Enterprise Customers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Free network flow monitoring for all enterprise customers
imageAssetFile.title: Free network flow monitoring for all enterprise customers

features.title: Advanced DNS Protection: mitigating sophisticated DNS DDoS attacks
features.description: We're proud to introduce the Advanced DNS Protection system, a robust defense mechanism designed to protect against the most sophisticated DNS-based DDoS attacks.

imageAssetFile.altText: Advanced DNS Protection
imageAssetFile.title: Advanced DNS Protection

features.title: Building secure websites: a guide to Cloudflare Pages and Turnstile Plugin
features.description: Learn how to use Cloudflare Pages and Turnstile to deploy your website quickly and easily while protecting it from bots, without compromising user experience. Follow our tutorial here for a seamless integration!

imageAssetFile.altText: Securing Your Pages Builds with Turnstile
imageAssetFile.title: Securing Your Pages Builds with Turnstile

features.title: General availability for WAF Content Scanning for file malware protection
features.description: Announcing the General Availability of WAF Content Scanning, protecting your web applications and APIs from malware by scanning files in-transit.

imageAssetFile.altText: WAF Content Scanning GA
imageAssetFile.title: WAF Content Scanning GA

features.title: Log Explorer: monitor security events without third-party storage
features.description: With the combined power of Security Analytics + Log Explorer, security teams can analyze, investigate, and monitor for security attacks natively within Cloudflare, reducing time to resolution and overall cost of ownership for customers by eliminating the need to forward logs to third-party SIEMs.

imageAssetFile.altText: Log Explorer, Eliminates Need for Third Party Storage Tools and Simplifies the Ability to Monitor Security Events
imageAssetFile.title: Log Explorer, Eliminates Need for Third Party Storage Tools and Simplifies the Ability to Monitor Security Events

features.title: Network performance update: Security Week 2024
features.description: Cloudflare is the fastest provider in 44% of networks around the world for 95th percentile connection time. Let's dig into the data and talk about how we do it.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Performance Update
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Performance Update

features.title: Cloudflare's URL Scanner, new features, and the story of how we built it
features.description: Discover the enhanced URL Scanner API: Now with direct access from the Security Center Investigate Portal, enjoy unlisted scans, multi-device screenshots, and seamless integration within the Cloudflare ecosystem. Perfect for developers and security professionals looking to elevate their website security assessments.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare's URL Scanner
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare's URL Scanner

features.title: Protocol detection with Cloudflare Gateway
features.description: Cloudflare Gateway, our secure web gateway (SWG), now supports the detection, logging, and filtering of network protocols using packet payloads without the need for inspection. Protocol detection makes it easier to set precise policies without filtering specific ports and without the risk of over/under-blocking activity.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Performance Update
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Performance Update

features.title: Introducing Requests for Information (RFIs) and Priority Intelligence Requirements (PIRs) for threat intelligence teams
features.description: Our Security Center now houses Requests for Information (RFIs) and Priority Intelligence Requirements (PIRs). These features are available via API as well and Cloudforce One customers can start leveraging them today for enhanced security analysis.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudforce One PIR and RFIs available in Security Center and via API
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudforce One PIR and RFIs available in Security Center and via API

features.title: Launching email security insights on Cloudflare Radar
features.description: The new Email Security section on Cloudflare Radar provides insights into the latest trends around threats found in malicious email, sources of spam and malicious email, and the adoption of technologies designed to prevent abuse of email.

imageAssetFile.altText: Launching email security insights on Cloudflare Radar
imageAssetFile.title: Launching email security insights on Cloudflare Radar

features.title: Harnessing chaos in Cloudflare offices
features.description: In the children's book The Snail and Whale, after an unexpectedly far-flung adventure, the principal character returns to declarations of "How time's flown" and "Haven't you grown?" It has been about four years since we last wrote about LavaRand and during that time the story of how Cloudflare uses physical sources of entropy to add to the security of the Internet has continued to travel and be a source of interest to many.

imageAssetFile.altText: Lavarand and drand
imageAssetFile.title: Lavarand and drand

features.title: Security Week 2024 wrap up
features.description: In this post we review the blogs released during Security Week 2024.

imageAssetFile.altText: Security Week 2024 wrap up
